com.soa.activity

Interface ActivityPerformerFactory


  • public interface ActivityPerformerFactory
    Interface of a factory that will create an activity implementation based on a given definition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ActivityPerformer createPerformer(org.w3c.dom.Node definition)
      Creates the activity.
      javax.xml.namespace.QName[] getSupportedActivities() 

    • Method Detail

      • getSupportedActivities

        javax.xml.namespace.QName[] getSupportedActivities()

      • createPerformer

        ActivityPerformer createPerformer(org.w3c.dom.Node definition)
                           throws com.digev.fw.exception.GException
        Creates the activity.
        Parameters:
        definition - Definition of the activity and it's configuration.
        Returns:
        Activity implementation.
        Throws:
        com.digev.fw.exception.GException - Thrown if the the activity could not be created. This is most likely caused by a definition the factory cannot understand.
